com.bignerdranch.android.multiselector

Class SwappingHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
      • android.support.v7.widget.RebindReportingHolder
        • com.bignerdranch.android.multiselector.MultiSelectorBindingHolder
          • com.bignerdranch.android.multiselector.SwappingHolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SelectableHolder

    public class SwappingHolder
extends MultiSelectorBindingHolder
implements SelectableHolder

    A holder extended to support having a selectable mode with a different background and state list animator.

    When setSelectable(boolean) is set to true, itemView's background is set to the value of selectionModeBackgroundDrawable, and its StateListAnimator is set to selectionModeStateListAnimator. When it is set to false, the defaultModeBackgroundDrawable and defaultModeStateListAnimator are used.

    defaultModeBackgroundDrawable and defaultModeStateListAnimator default to the values on itemView at the time the holder was constructed.

    selectionModeBackgroundDrawable defaults to a StateListDrawable that displays your colorAccent theme color when state_activated=true, and nothing otherwise. selectionModeStateListAnimator defaults to a raise animation that animates selection items to a 12dp translationZ.

    (Thanks to Kurt Nelson for examples and discussion on approaches here.)

    • Constructor Detail

      • SwappingHolder

        public SwappingHolder(View itemView,
                      MultiSelector multiSelector)

        Construct a new SelectableHolder hooked up to be controlled by a MultiSelector.

        If the MultiSelector is not null, the SelectableHolder can be selected by calling MultiSelector.setSelected(com.bignerdranch.android.multiselector.SelectableHolder, boolean).

        If the MultiSelector is null, the SelectableHolder acts as a standalone ViewHolder that you can control manually by setting setSelectable(boolean) and setActivated(boolean)

        Parameters:
        itemView - Item view for this ViewHolder
        multiSelector - A selector set to bind this holder to

      • SwappingHolder

        public SwappingHolder(View itemView)

        Construct a new standalone SelectableHolder.

        Selectable state can be controlled manually by setting setSelectable(boolean).

        Parameters:
        itemView - Item view for this ViewHolder

    • Method Detail

      • getSelectionModeBackgroundDrawable

        public Drawable getSelectionModeBackgroundDrawable()

        Background drawable to use in selection mode. This defaults to a state list drawable that uses the colorAccent theme value when state_activated==true.

        Returns:
        A background drawable

      • setSelectionModeBackgroundDrawable

        public void setSelectionModeBackgroundDrawable(Drawable selectionModeBackgroundDrawable)

        Set the background drawable to be used in selection mode.

        Parameters:
        selectionModeBackgroundDrawable - A background drawable

      • getDefaultModeBackgroundDrawable

        public Drawable getDefaultModeBackgroundDrawable()

        Background drawable to use when not in selection mode. This defaults to the drawable that was set on RecyclerView.ViewHolder.itemView at construction time.

        Returns:
        A background drawable

      • setDefaultModeBackgroundDrawable

        public void setDefaultModeBackgroundDrawable(Drawable defaultModeBackgroundDrawable)

        Set the background drawable to use when not in selection mode.

        Parameters:
        defaultModeBackgroundDrawable - A background drawable

      • getSelectionModeStateListAnimator

        public StateListAnimator getSelectionModeStateListAnimator()

        State list animator to use when in selection mode. This defaults to an animator that raises the view when state_activated==true.

        Returns:
        A state list animator

      • setSelectionModeStateListAnimator

        public void setSelectionModeStateListAnimator(int resId)

        Set the state list animator to use when in selection mode. If not run on a Lollipop device, this method is a no-op.

        Parameters:
        resId - A state list animator resource id. Ignored prior to Lollipop.

      • setSelectionModeStateListAnimator

        public void setSelectionModeStateListAnimator(StateListAnimator selectionModeStateListAnimator)
        Set the state list animator to use when in selection mode.
        Parameters:
        selectionModeStateListAnimator - A state list animator

      • getDefaultModeStateListAnimator

        public StateListAnimator getDefaultModeStateListAnimator()
        Get the state list animator to use when not in selection mode. This value defaults to the animator set on RecyclerView.ViewHolder.itemView at construction time.
        Returns:
        A state list animator

        Parameters:
        defaultModeStateListAnimator - A state list animator

      • setDefaultModeStateListAnimator

        public void setDefaultModeStateListAnimator(int resId)
        Set the state list animator to use when in default mode. If not run on a Lollipop device, this method is a no-op.
        Parameters:
        resId - A state list animator resource id. Ignored prior to Lollipop.

      • isSelectable

        public boolean isSelectable()
        Returns whether RecyclerView.ViewHolder.itemView is currently in a selectable mode.
        Specified by:
        isSelectable in interface SelectableHolder
        Returns:
        True if selectable.

      • setSelectable

        public void setSelectable(boolean isSelectable)
        Turns selection mode on and off. When in selection mode, RecyclerView.ViewHolder.itemView's background drawable is swapped out for the value of getSelectionModeBackgroundDrawable(). When not, it is set to getDefaultModeBackgroundDrawable(). If in Lollipop or greater versions, the same applies to getSelectionModeStateListAnimator() and getDefaultModeStateListAnimator().
        Specified by:
        setSelectable in interface SelectableHolder
        Parameters:
        isSelectable - True if selectable.
